name: Murdrum (Prologue)
description:
murdrum: the killing of a human being in a secret manner

You play as Arthur Walker, a man that has been falsely accused for a murder. Before being arrested, time is reset to the day before. It's now up to him and his brother Benjamin to uncover the truth and prove his innocence!

--------------------

NOTE: The current build contains only an early version of the prologue, as it's all we could get done on time for the jam. We have the entire story ready, so just keep an eye out for updates on the next chapters! Thank you as well for playing!

--------------------

Writer: Aliakin
Coding & Translation:  Helena (rena621)
Backgrounds & UI: Does
Character Art: Michelle (miixel)
Music & SFX: George Guilty
